name: Suspicious Desktopimgdownldr Command
description: Detects a suspicious Microsoft desktopimgdownldr execution with parameters used to download files from the Internet
false_positives: False positives depend on scripts and administrative tools used in the monitored environment
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.command_line:*\ \/lockscreenurl\:* AND (NOT (process.command_line:(*.jpg* OR *.jpeg* OR *.png*)))) OR (process.command_line:*reg\ delete* AND process.command_line:*\\PersonalizationCSP*))`
